items.name: PHP - Laravel
items.description: PHP is a powerful and widely used server-side scripting lanuage for web development.  Laravel is a powerful PHP framework for quickly building server-side and RESTful applications.

items.name: Ruby - Ruby on Rails
items.description: Ruby on Rails is an open source web framework for building efficient and sustainable server-side applications.

items.name: Python - Django
items.description: Django is a high-level python web framework for rapid development and clean code design
